member.name: T:dylan.NET.Reflection.AsmFactory
member.summary: Holds the resources used during assembly making.

member.name: F:dylan.NET.Reflection.AsmFactory.AddrFlg
member.summary: Set this to allow automatic valuetype pointer load during field chaining.

member.name: M:dylan.NET.Reflection.AsmFactory.AddTyp(IKVM.Reflection.Type)
member.param: The Type instance to add to the AsmFactory TypArr array.
member.summary: Adds a Type instance to the TypArr array.

member.name: M:dylan.NET.Reflection.AsmFactory.AddTypB(IKVM.Reflection.Emit.TypeBuilder)
member.summary: Add a TypeBuilder to the list of type builders.

member.name: F:dylan.NET.Reflection.AsmFactory.AsmB
member.summary: Holds the AssemblyBuilder for the assembly under construction.

member.name: F:dylan.NET.Reflection.AsmFactory.AsmFile
member.summary: Holds the name of the assembly under construction.

member.name: F:dylan.NET.Reflection.AsmFactory.AsmMode
member.summary: Holds the mode i.e. 'exe' or 'dll' of the assembly under construction.

member.name: F:dylan.NET.Reflection.AsmFactory.AsmNameStr
member.summary: Holds the AssemblyName for the assembly under construction.

member.name: F:dylan.NET.Reflection.AsmFactory.ChainFlg
member.summary: When set indicates that a method chain beyond field chaining boundaries is in progress.

member.name: M:dylan.NET.Reflection.AsmFactory.CreateTyp()
member.summary: Calls CreateType on the current TypeBuilder.
member.remarks: Usually done at the end of a class.

member.name: F:dylan.NET.Reflection.AsmFactory.CurnILGen
member.summary: Hold the ILGenerator for the current method or constructor.

member.name: F:dylan.NET.Reflection.AsmFactory.CurnInhTyp
member.summary: Holds a Type instance representing the base class for the class under construction.

member.name: F:dylan.NET.Reflection.AsmFactory.CurnMetName
member.summary: Holds the name of the method under cosntruction.

member.name: F:dylan.NET.Reflection.AsmFactory.CurnTypName
member.summary: Holds the name of the class under construction.

member.name: F:dylan.NET.Reflection.AsmFactory.DebugFlg
member.summary: If set indicates that debug information is required else its hould be unset.

member.name: F:dylan.NET.Reflection.AsmFactory.DfltNS
member.summary: Holds the default name space for an assembly usually its name.

member.name: F:dylan.NET.Reflection.AsmFactory.inClass
member.summary: If set indicates that a class is still being constructed.

member.name: M:dylan.NET.Reflection.AsmFactory.InitConstr()
member.summary: Initialises AsmFactory and ILEmitter to work with a new ConstructorBuilder.

member.name: M:dylan.NET.Reflection.AsmFactory.InitDelConstr()
member.summary: Initialises AsmFactory to work with a new Delegate's ConstructorBuilder.

member.name: M:dylan.NET.Reflection.AsmFactory.InitDelMet()
member.summary: Initialises AsmFactory to work with a new Delegate's MethodBuilder.

member.name: M:dylan.NET.Reflection.AsmFactory.InitMtd()
member.summary: Initialises AsmFactory and ILEmitter to work with a new MethodBuilder.

member.name: F:dylan.NET.Reflection.AsmFactory.InMethodFlg
member.summary: If set indicates that a method is under construction.

member.name: F:dylan.NET.Reflection.AsmFactory.isNested
member.summary: Indicates that the current type under construction is a nested class if set.

member.name: F:dylan.NET.Reflection.AsmFactory.PopFlg
member.summary: If set indicates that the next method call should be followed by a 'pop'

member.name: F:dylan.NET.Reflection.AsmFactory.Type01
member.summary: Usually holds the output of the EvalTTok method from the codegen module.
member.remarks: This field is usually reserved just for this usage.

member.name: F:dylan.NET.Reflection.AsmFactory.Type02
member.summary: Usually holds the output of the ASTEmit method of the codegen module.
member.remarks: This field is usually reserved just for this usage.

member.name: F:dylan.NET.Reflection.AsmFactory.Type03
member.summary: Usually used as temporary storage by the ASTEmit method of the codegen module.
member.remarks: This field is usually reserved just for this usage.

member.name: F:dylan.NET.Reflection.AsmFactory.Type04
member.summary: Usually used to pass in the Type of the field that will be loaded for checks associated with the AddrFlg.
member.remarks: This field is usually reserved just for this usage.

member.name: F:dylan.NET.Reflection.AsmFactory.Type05
member.summary: Usually used to pass in the type that declares the instance method to be called that is needed for checks associated with virtual valuetype method detection.
member.remarks: This field is usually reserved just for this usage.

member.name: T:dylan.NET.Reflection.ILEmitter
member.summary: This class contains methods used for emitting opcodes to the current IL generator.

member.name: F:dylan.NET.Reflection.ILEmitter.ArgInd
member.summary: The index for the last declared argument.

member.name: F:dylan.NET.Reflection.ILEmitter.DebugFlg
member.summary: If debugging is enabled this flag is set else it is unset (false).
member.remarks: Usually this reflects the value of the Debug Flag in AsmFactory.

member.name: F:dylan.NET.Reflection.ILEmitter.DocWriter
member.remarks: Used if debugging information is to be written.

member.name: M:dylan.NET.Reflection.ILEmitter.EmitAdd(System.Boolean)
member.param: If the operands are signed or not.
member.summary: Emits variants of the 'add' opcode accrodingly.

member.name: M:dylan.NET.Reflection.ILEmitter.EmitCge(System.Boolean)
member.param: If the operands are signed or not.

member.name: M:dylan.NET.Reflection.ILEmitter.EmitCgt(System.Boolean)
member.param: If the operands are signed or not.

member.name: M:dylan.NET.Reflection.ILEmitter.EmitCle(System.Boolean)
member.param: If the operands are signed or not.

member.name: M:dylan.NET.Reflection.ILEmitter.EmitClt(System.Boolean)
member.param: If the operands are signed or not.

member.name: M:dylan.NET.Reflection.ILEmitter.EmitConvI()
member.remarks: Useful in preparing indices to work with array opcodes.

member.name: M:dylan.NET.Reflection.ILEmitter.EmitConvI4()
member.remarks: Useful to convert array lengths returned by 'ldlen' to more appropriate format.

member.name: M:dylan.NET.Reflection.ILEmitter.EmitConvU()
member.remarks: Useful in preparing indices to work with array opcodes.

member.name: M:dylan.NET.Reflection.ILEmitter.EmitDelegateAdd()
member.remarks: Useful for supporting '+' overload on delegates.

member.name: M:dylan.NET.Reflection.ILEmitter.EmitDelegateSub()
member.remarks: Useful for supporting '-' overload on delegates.

member.name: M:dylan.NET.Reflection.ILEmitter.EmitDiv(System.Boolean)
member.param: If the operands are signed or not.
member.summary: Emits the variants of the 'div' opcode accordingly.

member.name: M:dylan.NET.Reflection.ILEmitter.EmitLdarg(System.Int32)
member.param: The index of the argument to load.
member.summary: Emits one of the variants of 'ldarg' accordingly.
member.remarks: To get the address of the argument instead use EmitLdarga.

member.name: M:dylan.NET.Reflection.ILEmitter.EmitLdarga(System.Int32)
member.param: The index of the argument whose address is required.
member.remarks: If the actual argument locations's stored value is needed use EmitLdarg isntead.

member.name: M:dylan.NET.Reflection.ILEmitter.EmitLdcBool(System.Boolean)
member.param: The boolean value to emit a load for.
member.summary: Emits 'ldc.i4.1' or 'ldc.i4.0' for true or false respectively.

member.name: M:dylan.NET.Reflection.ILEmitter.EmitLdcChar(System.Char)
member.param: The character to emit a load for.
member.summary: Emits one of the variants of 'ldc.i4' opcode using the numerical unicode value of the character as the integer loaded.

member.name: M:dylan.NET.Reflection.ILEmitter.EmitLdcI1(System.SByte)
member.param: The int8 number to emit a load for.
member.summary: Emits one of the variants of 'ldc.i4' followed by a 'conv.i1'.

member.name: M:dylan.NET.Reflection.ILEmitter.EmitLdcI2(System.Int16)
member.param: The int16 number to emit a load for.
member.summary: Emits one of the variants of 'ldc.i4' followed by a 'conv.i2'.

member.name: M:dylan.NET.Reflection.ILEmitter.EmitLdcI4(System.Int32)
member.param: The int32 number to emit a load for.
member.summary: Emits one of the variants of the 'ldc.i4' opcode.

member.name: M:dylan.NET.Reflection.ILEmitter.EmitLdcI8(System.Int64)
member.param: The int64 number to emit a load for.
member.summary: Emits one of the variants of 'ldc.i4' followed by a 'conv.i8' or an 'ldc.i8' accordingly.

member.name: M:dylan.NET.Reflection.ILEmitter.EmitLdcR4(System.Single)
member.param: The float32 number to emit a load for.

member.name: M:dylan.NET.Reflection.ILEmitter.EmitLdcR8(System.Double)
member.param: The float64 number to emit a load for.

member.name: M:dylan.NET.Reflection.ILEmitter.EmitLdelem(IKVM.Reflection.Type)
member.param: The type of the array element.
member.summary: Emits one of the 'ldelem' variants accordingly.
member.remarks: If the address of the location is desired use EmitLdelema instead.

member.name: M:dylan.NET.Reflection.ILEmitter.EmitLdfld(IKVM.Reflection.FieldInfo)
member.remarks: An instance of a class must be loaded prior to this emission. If a static field is to be loaded use EmitLdsfld instead. If the address is required use EmitLdflda instead.

member.name: M:dylan.NET.Reflection.ILEmitter.EmitLdflda(IKVM.Reflection.FieldInfo)
member.param: The instance field whose address is required.
member.remarks: An instance of a class must be loaded prior to this emission.If the actual value is required use EmitLdfld instead. If the address of a static field is required use EmitLdsflda.

member.name: M:dylan.NET.Reflection.ILEmitter.EmitLdftn(IKVM.Reflection.MethodInfo)
member.param: The static method to which a pointer is needed.
member.remarks: If the pointer to an instance method is needed use EmitLdvirtftn instead.

member.name: M:dylan.NET.Reflection.ILEmitter.EmitLdloc(System.Int32)
member.param: The index of the location to load.
member.summary: Emits one of the variants of the 'ldloc' opcode.
member.remarks: If the address to the location is needed use EmitLdloca instead.

member.name: M:dylan.NET.Reflection.ILEmitter.EmitLdloca(System.Int32)
member.param: The index of the location whose address is needed.
member.summary: Emits one of the variants of the 'ldloca' opcode.
member.remarks: If the actual value is needed use EmitLdloc instead.

member.name: M:dylan.NET.Reflection.ILEmitter.EmitLdsfld(IKVM.Reflection.FieldInfo)
member.remarks: If the address is needed use EmitLdsflda instead.

member.name: M:dylan.NET.Reflection.ILEmitter.EmitLdsflda(IKVM.Reflection.FieldInfo)
member.param: The static field whose address is required.
member.remarks: If the actual value of the field is needed use EmitLdsfld instead.

member.name: M:dylan.NET.Reflection.ILEmitter.EmitLdtoken(IKVM.Reflection.Type)
member.param: The type whose token is needed.
member.remarks: Useful for gettype/typeof implementation and in calling castclass.

member.name: M:dylan.NET.Reflection.ILEmitter.EmitLdvirtftn(IKVM.Reflection.MethodInfo)
member.param: The instance method whose pointer is needed.
member.remarks: An instance of a class must be loaded prior to this emission. If the pointer to a static method is required use EmitLdftn instead.

member.name: M:dylan.NET.Reflection.ILEmitter.EmitLike()
member.remarks: Useful to compare strings against a pattern. This adds an implicit reference to System.dll!!!

member.name: M:dylan.NET.Reflection.ILEmitter.EmitMul(System.Boolean)
member.param: If the operands are signed or not.
member.summary: Emits one of the variants of the 'mul' opcode.

member.name: M:dylan.NET.Reflection.ILEmitter.EmitNand()
member.remarks: Applies a 1's complemented 'and' to its operands (nand).

member.name: M:dylan.NET.Reflection.ILEmitter.EmitNeg()
member.remarks: Does a 2's complement negation on its operand.

member.name: M:dylan.NET.Reflection.ILEmitter.EmitNewarr(IKVM.Reflection.Type)
member.param: The type of the array to make.
member.remarks: Useful for making arrays. The length of the array of type IntPtr must be loaded prior to this emission.

member.name: M:dylan.NET.Reflection.ILEmitter.EmitNLike()
member.summary: Emits a sequence of Regex.IsMatch, 'ldc.i4.0' and 'ceq' .
member.remarks: Useul to check if a string does not conform to a pattern (notlike).

member.name: M:dylan.NET.Reflection.ILEmitter.EmitNor()
member.remarks: dpes a 1's complemented 'or' (nor) on its operands.

member.name: M:dylan.NET.Reflection.ILEmitter.EmitNot()
member.remarks: For booleans consider using 'ldc.i4.0' followed by a 'ceq' instead i.e. use EmitLdcI4(0) and EmitCeq.

member.name: M:dylan.NET.Reflection.ILEmitter.EmitOr()
member.remarks: Does an inclusive 'or' on its opcode.

member.name: M:dylan.NET.Reflection.ILEmitter.EmitPop()
member.remarks: Usful when a value on the stack is not needed.

member.name: M:dylan.NET.Reflection.ILEmitter.EmitRem(System.Boolean)
member.param: If the operands are signed or not.
member.remarks: Does a modulo operantion on the operands (%).

member.name: M:dylan.NET.Reflection.ILEmitter.EmitRet()
member.remarks: Useful for returning the control to the method which called this one.

member.name: M:dylan.NET.Reflection.ILEmitter.EmitStarg(System.Int32)
member.param: The index of the argument to store to.
member.summary: Emits one of the variants of the 'starg' opcode.

member.name: M:dylan.NET.Reflection.ILEmitter.EmitStloc(System.Int32)
member.param: The index of the loaction to store in.
member.summary: Emist one of the variants of the 'stloc' opcode.

member.name: M:dylan.NET.Reflection.ILEmitter.EmitStrAdd()
member.remarks: Useful for supporting string concatenation as addition of strings.

member.name: M:dylan.NET.Reflection.ILEmitter.EmitStrCeq()
member.summary: Emits a combination of String.Compare, 'ldc.i4.0' and 'ceq'.
member.remarks: Checks if two strings are equal. The use of the Equality overload in System.String is preferred over this.

member.name: M:dylan.NET.Reflection.ILEmitter.EmitStrCneq()
member.summary: Emits a combination of String.Compare, 'ldc.i4.0','ceq','ldc.i4.0' and 'ceq'.
member.remarks: Checks if two strings are not equal. The use of the Inequality overload in System.String is preferred over this.

member.name: M:dylan.NET.Reflection.ILEmitter.EmitSub(System.Boolean)
member.param: If the operands are signed or not.
member.summary: Emits one of the variants of the 'sub' opcode.

member.name: M:dylan.NET.Reflection.ILEmitter.EmitXnor()
member.remarks: Does a 1's complemented 'xor' (xnor) on its operands.

member.name: M:dylan.NET.Reflection.ILEmitter.EmitXor()
member.remarks: Does an exclusive 'or' (xor) on its operands .

member.name: F:dylan.NET.Reflection.ILEmitter.LocInd
member.summary: The index for the last declared variable.

member.name: M:dylan.NET.Reflection.ILEmitter.MarkDbgPt(System.Int32)
member.summary: Marks a trace point in the debug symbols.
member.remarks: Useful when supporting debug symbol making.

member.name: F:dylan.NET.Reflection.ILEmitter.StaticFlg
member.summary: Set if the current method is static else unset.
